key.name: debug
key.description: Whether to send debug information to the system log.

key.name: dash-location-monitor
key.description: On which monitor the dock is located.

key.name: panel-appearance-merge
key.description: Whether to use a custom theme for the panel dash that allows it to visually blend into the panel.

key.name: panel-custom-height
key.description: Whether to set a custom height for the panel.

key.name: dock-stretch
key.description: Whether to to stretch the dock to fill the monitor edge.

key.name: dock-alignment
key.description: How to align icons in the dock.

key.name: dock-borders
key.description: Whether to show border when docked on left or right monitor edges.

key.name: icons-highlight-focused
key.description: Whether to highlight the icon for the currently focused application.

key.name: icons-dots
key.description: Whether to show dots for the number of open windows for each icon.

key.name: icons-app-menu
key.description: Hide the built-in application menu and show it in the relevant icon menu instead.

key.name: icons-media-controls
key.description: Whether to show media controls in the menu if supported by the application.

key.name: icons-left-click
key.description: What to do when an icon is left-clicked.

key.name: icons-middle-click
key.description: What to do when an icon is middle-clicked.

key.name: icons-hover
key.description: What to do when the mouse hovers over an icon.

key.name: icons-wheel-scroll
key.description: Whether to cycle windows when mouse wheel scrolling on an icon.
